title: Looking for a club with people to play Normals with (I'm Bronze if you care)
body: Hi everyone! After playing a game with a troll jungler who stood in base half the time and did nothing ("bcz its normalz"), and experiencing similar games for the last few weeks, I realised I wanted to play with like-minded individuals who play the game for fun. I don't mind if the club likes to play off-meta champions\\. And yes, I am in Bronze, because before a month ago I couldn't care less about playing with people who think they're God and all of their teammates are just "worthless feeders" (now I'm forcing myself to play Ranked matches so I can see how good/bad I really am, rather than have people who look up my LoL King profile before a match tell me about it).

replies.body: join my club it's got lots of bronze and silver and we've got 44 members

hey dude, hit me up! i feel the same way as you, im an anti toxic gold 5 jungle and support main, i quite often love to play just whatever suits me and i mute at the first sign of toxicity. i current roam around on teamspeak with a few friends who feel the same way, and we have fun whether we win or lose. add me ingame "Jackie Frags" and the teamspeak i currently use when im not working is ts3.srcshosting.com.au. i play 2 - 3 games a night when its slow and maybe more when im really feeling in the mood.
Sure I'll hang with ya, send me an invite. I've been wanting to find a group of friends to play with for a while, name is Jusoraas in-game.
Hit me up :), i'm new to the game and experiencing multiple champs rn. Same name btw
I can play. Add me (same name).
